thread.title: Vikram’s 10 Endrathukulla censored
thread.title_full: Vikram’s 10 Endrathukulla censored - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Vikram’s 10 Endrathukulla censored
text: The action packed '10 Endrathukulla' starring Vikram & Samantha and directed by Vijay Milton has been censored and certified with a U. The movie is scheduled to release on October 21. Produced by Fox Star India and AR Murugadoss the film is a road thriller film and has music composed by D Imman. While Samantha is pairing up with Vikram for the first time after making it to the top league with Anjaan and Kaththi, Pasupathy will be playing a pivotal role in the film. Sony Music has acquired the audio rights of the film.
